attributes.action: Avoid Publication clash re Robert Francis QC Mid Staffs Public Inquiry Report and Lord Leveson Phonehacking Report
attributes.additional_details:
Robert Francis QC is presenting Mid Staffs  Public Inquiry Report to Dept of Health on 15th October 2012.  Publication will follow when Secretary of State for Health Andrew Lansley decides.
A publication clash with Lord Leveson QC  Phone Hacking Report must be avoided. In memory of the people who died at Mid Staffs hospital. I feel Government  must repect grieving families by releasing the Mid Staffs Report promptly and avoiding a publication clash with Lord Leveson's Report
